dcterms:creator: Luisa Bentivogli
Beatrice Savoldi
Matteo Negri
Mattia A. Di Gangi
Roldano Cattoni
Marco Turchi
dcterms:description: MuST-SHE is a gender-sensitive benchmark available for both English-French and English-Italian, built on naturally occurring instances of gender phenomena retrieved from the TED-based MuST-C corpus. It allows for the evaluation of gender translation on qualitatively differentiated and balanced masculine/feminine forms.
dcterms:title: MuST-SHE

dcterms:creator: Roldano Cattoni
Mattia A. Di Gangi
Luisa Bentivogli
Matteo Negri
Marco Turchi
dcterms:description: MuST-C is a multilingual corpus for end-to-end speech translation, containing a large amount of speech data for various language pairs, including English-French and English-Italian.
dcterms:title: MuST-C
